USAGE
=======

The file (run_analysis.R) assumes it is sourced within a working directory which is the uncompressed contents of the UCI HAR Dataset.

OUTPUT
=======

The script outputs a file called “finalOutput.txt”.

The file contains a series of columns with rows of mean values derived from the raw data. The names of these columns are:

"subjectid"
"activityname"
"tBodyAcc-mean()-X"
"tBodyAcc-mean()-Y"
"tBodyAcc-mean()-Z"
"tBodyAcc-std()-X"
"tBodyAcc-std()-Y"
"tBodyAcc-std()-Z"
